TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlProfileProvider extends System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider

summary.span: Manages storage of profile information for an ASP.NET application in a SQL Server database.

span.span: Manages storage of profile information for an ASP.NET application in a SQL Server database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 配置文件用于存储和检索数据源，如数据库中的用户设置。The ASP.NET profile is used to store and retrieve user settings in a data source such as a database. 使用访问用户配置文件属性与当前。The user profile is accessed using the property of the current . 使用配置文件提供程序管理配置文件信息和属性值。Profile information and property values are managed using a profile provider. ASP.NET 使用类来存储和检索配置文件使用 SQL Server 数据库的 ASP.NET 应用程序的设置。The class is used by ASP.NET to store and retrieve profile settings for an ASP.NET application that is using a SQL Server database. 若要使用，必须先创建使用的 SQL Server 数据库。To use a , you must first create the SQL Server database used by the . 若要创建使用的数据库，运行 aspnet_regsql.exe 工具，它位于 [*驱动器*:] \WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\ `2.0versionNumber`文件夹，并指定 **-A p**选项。To create the database used by the , run the aspnet_regsql.exe tool, which is found in the [*drive*:]\WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\`2.0versionNumber` folder, and specify the **-A p** option. 以下命令演示了如何使用 aspnet_regsql.exe 可执行文件：The following command demonstrates how you might use the aspnet_regsql.exe executable: ``` aspnet_regsql.exe -A p ``` 上面的示例中不会指定创建的数据库的名称，因此将使用默认名称。The example above does not specify a name for the database that is created, so the default name will be used. 默认数据库名称为 Aspnetdb。The default database name is Aspnetdb. 计算机配置包含默认名为 AspNetSqlProvider 连接到本地计算机上的 SQL Server 的实例。The machine configuration contains a default instance named AspNetSqlProvider that connects to the SQL Server on the local machine. 可以使用该提供程序，此实例，也可以指定自己的 Web.config 文件中的 ASP.NET 应用程序。You can use this instance of the provider, or specify your own in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用集成的安全性的连接字符串配置配置文件提供程序，ASP.NET 应用程序的进程帐户必须有权连接到 SQL Server 数据库。If the profile provider is configured with a connection string that uses integrated security, the process account of the ASP.NET application must have rights to connect to the SQL Server database. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了配置为使用 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件。The following code example shows the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application configured to use a . ``` ```

span.span: Creates an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 调用构造函数创建的实例类使用该应用程序的配置文件中指定的值。ASP.NET calls the constructor to create an instance of the class using the values specified in the configuration file for the application. 此构造函数不是要在代码中使用。This constructor is not intended to be used from your code.

summary.span: Gets or sets the name of the application for which to store and retrieve profile information.

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application for which to store and retrieve profile information.

value.span: 要存储和检索配置文件信息的应用程序的名称。

span.span: The name of the application for which to store and retrieve profile information.
The default is the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性由若要将配置文件信息与不同的应用程序相关联。The property is used by the to associate profile information with different applications. 这使多个应用程序可以使用相同的数据库来存储用户信息而无需重复的用户之间发生冲突。This enables multiple applications to use the same database to store user information without running into conflicts between duplicate users. 多个 ASP.NET 应用程序可以通过指定相同的值中使用相同的用户数据库属性。Multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same user database by specifying the same value in the property. 可以以编程方式设置属性或者可以在 Web 应用程序使用的配置文件中以声明方式设置`applicationName`属性。The property can be set programmatically, or it can be set declaratively in the configuration file for the Web application using the `applicationName` attribute. 如果没有为指定值`applicationName`Web 应用程序，在配置文件中的属性则值用于 ASP.NET 应用程序。If a value is not specified for the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file for the Web application, then the value is used for ASP.NET applications. 对于非 ASP.NET 应用程序，默认值是不带文件扩展名值。For non-ASP.NET applications, the default value is the value without the file extension. > [!CAUTION] > 因为一个默认配置文件提供程序实例用于所有服务的请求对象，可以有多个请求同时执行，并尝试设置属性值。Because a single default profile provider instance is used for all of the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 属性不是线程安全的多个写入操作，且不断变化属性值可能会导致多个用户的应用程序的意外行为。The property is not thread safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application. 建议您避免编写代码，使用户能够设置属性除非必要，否则。It is recommended that you avoid writing code that allows users to set the property unless you must. 应用程序的示例情况属性可能需要是管理多个应用程序的配置文件数据的管理应用程序。An example of an application where setting the property may be required is an administrative application that manages profile data for multiple applications. 此类应用程序应在单用户应用程序并不是 Web 应用程序。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了中的元素`system.web`的 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件部分。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 指定应用程序的实例并设置属性值设置为`MyApplication`。It specifies the application's instance and sets the property value to `MyApplication`. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于从指定的应用程序的数据源中删除未使用的配置文件数据`applicationName`配置文件中的属性。The method is used to remove unused profile data from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 使用`authenticationOption`参数来指定是否仅匿名配置文件，仅经过身份验证配置文件或要搜索的所有配置文件。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 搜索的配置文件，所有与配置文件当天或之前指定发生这种情况`userInactiveSinceDate`删除参数值。Of the searched profiles, any profile with a that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value is deleted. 在调用期间执行数据库更新方法将在事务内完成。The database updates that are performed during the call to the method are made within a transaction. 如果遇到错误，则回滚事务并不执行任何更新。If an error is encountered, the transaction is rolled back and no updates are performed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了 ASP.NET 页面，用于管理不活动配置文件。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that manages inactive profiles. 提供了一个按钮来删除自指定的日期考虑到一个配置文件处于非活动状态起未访问过的所有配置文件。A button is provided to delete all profiles that have not been accessed since the date specified for considering a profile to be inactive. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/CS/DeleteInactiveProfilescs.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/VB/DeleteInactiveProfilesvb.aspx#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从指定的应用程序数据源中删除所有个人资料信息和属性指定配置文件的`applicationName`配置文件中的属性。The method deletes all profile information and properties for the specified profiles from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 要删除的配置文件列表指定为用户名称的字符串数组。The list of profiles to delete is specified as a string array of user names. 如果在用户名中的数据源中存在的配置文件属性和信息`usernames`参数，将其删除。If profile properties and information exist in the data source for a user name in the `usernames` parameter, they are deleted. 返回值可能不同于指定的数组的长度`usernames`。The return value may differ from the length of the specified array of `usernames`. 这指示指定的数组中的配置文件的一些`usernames`了已从数据存储区中删除。This indicates that some of the profiles in the specified array of `usernames` were already deleted from the data store. 在调用期间执行数据库更新方法将在事务内完成。The database updates that are performed during the call to the method are made within a transaction. 如果遇到错误，则回滚事务并不执行任何更新。If an error is encountered, the transaction is rolled back and no updates are performed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了 ASP.NET 页面，用于管理不活动配置文件。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that manages inactive profiles. 一个控件显示返回的非活动配置文件。A control displays the inactive profiles returned. 每一行控件包含一个按钮，从数据源通过调用中删除该行的配置文件方法。Each row of the control includes a button that deletes the profile for that row from the data source with a call to the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/CS/DeleteInactiveProfilescs.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/VB/DeleteInactiveProfilesvb.aspx#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从指定的应用程序数据源中删除所有个人资料信息和属性指定配置文件的`applicationName`配置文件中的属性。The method deletes all profile information and properties for the specified profiles from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 使用指定的配置文件，以删除列表作为传递`profiles`参数。The list of profiles to delete is specified using a that is passed as the `profiles` parameter. 一个可以从返回， ， ，和方法。A can be returned from the , , , and methods. 返回值可能不同于值提供的。The return value may differ from the value for the supplied . 这指示中指定的配置文件的一些不再在数据存储中找到。This indicates that some of the profiles in the specified were no longer found in the data store. 在调用期间执行数据库更新方法将在事务内完成。The database updates that are performed during the call to the method are made within a transaction. 如果遇到错误，则回滚事务并不执行任何更新。If an error is encountered, the transaction is rolled back and no updates are performed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例允许用户使用的配置文件中搜索和方法。The following code example allows a user to search for profiles using the and methods. 用户可以删除通过调用返回的配置文件方法。The user can then delete the returned profiles with a call to the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于检索有关指定的应用程序未使用的用户配置文件的个人资料信息`applicationName`配置文件中的属性。The method is used to retrieve profile information for unused user profiles for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 此方法将只检索配置文件为其配置文件的用户名与提供`usernameToMatch`参数值。This method will only retrieve profiles for which the user name for the profile matches the supplied `usernameToMatch` parameter value. 使用`authenticationOption`参数来指定是否仅匿名配置文件，仅经过身份验证配置文件或要搜索的所有配置文件。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 搜索的配置文件，所有与配置文件发生这种情况之前指定`userInactiveSinceDate`返回参数值。Of the searched profiles, any profile with a that occurs before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value is returned. 搜索的匹配项`usernameToMatch`参数值使用`LIKE`关键字，并支持通配符，例如百分号 （%）。The searches for a match of the `usernameToMatch` parameter value using the `LIKE` keyword and supports wildcard characters, such as the percent (%) sign. 例如，如果`usernameToMatch`参数设置为"user1"，则返回为配置文件的用户名称为"user1"的配置文件信息，如果它存在。For example, if the `usernameToMatch` parameter is set to "user1", then profile information for the profile with the user name of "user1" is returned, if it exists. 如果`usernameToMatch`参数设置为"user %"，则返回"user1"、"user2"、"user_admin"等的配置文件的用户名的配置文件信息。If the `usernameToMatch` parameter is set to "user%", then profile information for profiles with the user name of "user1", "user2", "user_admin", and so on are returned. 用户自己的配置文件已添加到数据存储中的顺序返回。Users are returned in the order that their profiles were added to the data store. 返回的结果受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`参数。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`参数标识的最大数目对象中返回。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`参数标识要返回的结果页; 0 标识的第一页。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return; 0 identifies the first page. `totalRecords`参数是`out`参数设置为已配置的非活动状态的用户配置文件的总数`applicationName`根据`authenticationOption`和`userInactiveSinceDate`参数。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the configured `applicationName`, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters. 例如，如果有已配置的 13 个用户`applicationName`，并`pageIndex`值为 1`pageSize`为 5，返回将包含第六到第十个不活动配置文件。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned will contain the sixth through the tenth inactive profiles. `totalRecords`参数将设置为 13。The `totalRecords` parameter will be set to 13. ## Examples 下面的代码示例允许用户提供`usernameToMatch`值和一个和检索配置文件的任何匹配的配置文件信息。The following code example allows a user to supply a `usernameToMatch` value and a and retrieves profile information for any matching profiles. 该示例还允许用户指定是否以独占方式返回不活动配置文件。The example also allows the user to specify whether to return inactive profiles exclusively. 如果用户指定仅不活动配置文件方法是调用; 否则为调用方法。If the user specifies only inactive profiles, the method is called; otherwise, the method is called. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/CS/FindProfilesByUserNamecs.aspx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/VB/FindProfilesByUserNamevb.aspx#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将返回为其配置文件的用户名匹配所提供的配置文件信息的列表`usernameToMatch`已配置的参数值。The method returns a list of profile information for which the user name for the profile matches the supplied `usernameToMatch` parameter value for the configured . 使用`authenticationOption`参数来指定是否仅匿名配置文件，仅经过身份验证配置文件或要搜索的所有配置文件。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 搜索的匹配项`usernameToMatch`参数值使用`LIKE`关键字，并支持通配符，例如百分号 （%）。The searches for a match of the `usernameToMatch` parameter value using the `LIKE` keyword and supports wildcard characters, such as the percent (%) sign. 例如，如果`usernameToMatch`参数设置为"user1"，则返回为配置文件的用户名称为"user1"的配置文件信息，如果它存在。For example, if the `usernameToMatch` parameter is set to "user1", then profile information for the profile with the user name of "user1" is returned, if it exists. 如果`usernameToMatch`参数设置为"user %"，则返回"user1"、"user2"、"user_admin"等的配置文件的用户名的配置文件信息。If the `usernameToMatch` parameter is set to "user%", then profile information for profiles with the user name of "user1", "user2", "user_admin", and so on are returned. 用户自己的配置文件已添加到数据存储中的顺序返回。Users are returned in the order that their profiles were added to the data store. 返回的结果受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`参数。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`参数标识的最大数目对象中返回。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`参数标识要返回的结果页; 0 标识的第一页。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return; 0 identifies the first page. `totalRecords`参数是`out`参数设置为指定的应用程序的非活动状态的用户配置文件的总数`applicationName`属性中配置文件中，基于`authenticationOption`和`userInactiveSinceDate`参数。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters. 例如，如果有已配置的 13 个用户`applicationName`，并`pageIndex`值为 1`pageSize`为 5，返回将包含第六到第十个配置文件。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned will contain the sixth through the tenth profiles. `totalRecords`参数将设置为 13。The `totalRecords` parameter will be set to 13. ## Examples 下面的代码示例允许用户提供`usernameToMatch`值和一个和检索配置文件的任何匹配的配置文件信息。The following code example allows a user to supply a `usernameToMatch` value and a and retrieves profile information for any matching profiles. 该示例还允许用户指定是否以独占方式返回不活动配置文件。The example also allows the user to specify whether to return inactive profiles exclusively. 如果用户指定仅不活动配置文件方法是调用; 否则为调用方法。If the user specifies only inactive profiles, the method is called; otherwise, the method is called. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/CS/FindProfilesByUserNamecs.aspx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/VB/FindProfilesByUserNamevb.aspx#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于从指定的应用程序的未使用的用户配置文件的数据源中检索配置文件信息`applicationName`配置文件中的属性。The method is used to retrieve profile information from the data source for unused user profiles for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 使用`authenticationOption`参数来指定是否仅匿名配置文件，仅经过身份验证配置文件或要搜索的所有配置文件。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 搜索的配置文件，所有与配置文件发生这种情况之前指定`userInactiveSinceDate`返回参数值。Of the searched profiles, any profile with a that occurs before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value is returned. 返回的结果受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`参数。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`参数标识的最大数目对象中返回。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`参数标识要返回的结果页; 0 标识的第一页。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return; 0 identifies the first page. `totalRecords`参数是`out`参数设置为已配置的非活动状态的用户配置文件的总数`applicationName`根据`authenticationOption`和`userInactiveSinceDate`参数。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the configured `applicationName`, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters. 例如，如果有已配置的 13 个用户`applicationName`，并`pageIndex`值为 1`pageSize`为 5，返回将包含第六到第十个不活动配置文件。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned will contain the sixth through the tenth inactive profiles. `totalRecords`参数将设置为 13。The `totalRecords` parameter will be set to 13. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了 ASP.NET 页面，用于管理不活动配置文件。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that manages inactive profiles. 提供了一个按钮来删除非活动状态的所有配置文件。A button is provided to delete all inactive profiles. 是否将配置文件视为处于非活动状态基于为指定的日期`userInactiveSinceDate`参数。Whether a profile is considered inactive is based on the date specified for the `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于从指定的应用程序的数据源中检索配置文件的个人资料信息`applicationName`配置文件中的属性。The method is used to retrieve profile information for profiles from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 使用`authenticationOption`参数来指定是否仅匿名配置文件，仅经过身份验证配置文件或要搜索的所有配置文件。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 返回的结果受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`参数。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`参数标识的最大数目对象中返回。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`参数标识要返回的结果页; 0 标识的第一页。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return; 0 identifies the first page. `totalRecords`参数是`out`参数设置为已配置的非活动状态的用户配置文件的总数`applicationName`根据`authenticationOption`和`userInactiveSinceDate`参数。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the configured `applicationName`, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters. 例如，如果有已配置的 13 个用户`applicationName`，并`pageIndex`值为 1`pageSize`为 5，返回将包含第六到第十个配置文件。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned will contain the sixth through the tenth profiles. `totalRecords`参数将设置为 13。The `totalRecords` parameter will be set to 13. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示所有已配置的配置文件的配置文件信息`applicationName`中的数据页。The following code example displays profile information for all of the profiles for the configured `applicationName` in pages of data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于从指定的应用程序的数据源检索的所有未使用的用户配置文件计数`applicationName`配置文件中的属性。The method is used to retrieve a count of all of the unused user profiles from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 使用`authenticationOption`参数来指定是否仅匿名配置文件，仅经过身份验证配置文件或要搜索的所有配置文件。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 搜索配置文件中，使用的所有配置文件当天或之前指定发生这种情况`userInactiveSinceDate`参数值进行计数。Of the searched profiles, all profiles with a that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value are counted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例允许用户查看和删除基于搜索条件的活动和非活动配置文件信息。The following code example allows a user to view and delete active and inactive profiles information based on search criteria. 使用的结果显示的不活动配置文件计数方法。A count of inactive profiles is displayed using the results of the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/CS/FindProfilesByUserNamecs.aspx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider/VB/FindProfilesByUserNamevb.aspx#5)]
